text.jpText:
『日本ダービー』が目前に迫る中、
メジロアルダンは、かつてない気迫で自分を
追い込むも、そのせいで倒れかけてしまう。
text.enText:
With the "Japan Derby" just around the 
corner, Mejiro Aldan pushes herself with 
unprecedented determination. She pushes 
herself to the limit, but nearly collapses 
because of it.

text.jpText:
彼女には、“今”の自分のままでは
『日本ダービー』でサクラチヨノオーと
ヤエノムテキに勝てないという確信があった。
text.enText:
She was convinced that she could not win the 
Japan Derby against Sakura Chiyono O and 
Yaenomteci if she did not change her 
"current" self. She was convinced that she 
could not beat Sakura Chiyono O and 
Yaenomteki in the "Japan Derby.

text.jpText:
2人に勝利し、想いを成就させるべく、
“今”の自分の限界を超えたいと
切望するメジロアルダン。
text.enText:
To win over the two and to fulfill her 
feelings for them, she is determined to go 
beyond her "current" limits. Mejiro Aldan is 
eager to go beyond her "current" limits to 
fulfill her feelings for the two men.

text.jpText:
トレーナーとして最後の一線を守りながら、
メジロアルダンと共にギリギリまで
研鑽することを決意するのであった。
text.enText:
She decided to study with Mejiro Aldan until 
the very last minute, while keeping her last 
line of defense as a trainer. She was 
determined to study with Mejiro Aldan until 
the very end of her career, while keeping her 
last line of defense as a trainer.
